title: Father's Day
contents: Celebrate Father’s Day in NYC on June 19 by treating dad to a steak dinner at one of the city’s acclaimed steak houses: from Smith and Wollensky to Bobby Van’s to Peter Luger. WestHouse residents should remember to stop by The Den to end the night with a fine wine or crafted cocktail.
preview: Celebrate Father’s Day in NYC on June 19 by treating dad to a steak dinner at one of the city’s acclaimed steak houses
